StringTable.Label: PrecursorProductionAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]After securing the Precursor Artifact, our scientists have found a new technology that will greatly increase the Raw Production of our worlds.[/COLOR]
[ICON=Stat_Raw_Productive_Icon] +1 Raw production to all colonies

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]After securing the Precursor Artifact, our scientists have discovered some amazing new technologies that should easily advance our current Research. [/COLOR] [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] + 500 Research points

StringTable.Label: PrecursorCreditsAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]After studying this Precursor Artifact, our Surveyors are very excited. They have found valuable artifacts that will increase the income of our entire civilization.[/COLOR]
[ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +25% to income of all colonies

StringTable.Label: PrecursorInfluenceAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]After capturing the Precursor Artifact, we have found a treasure trove of Precursor art. It is so impressive that the trove has greatly increased our Influence throughout the galaxy.[/COLOR]
[ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +25% Influence to all colonies

StringTable.Label: PrecursorHitPointsAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Inside the debris field of this Precursor Artifact, we have found an amazing new alloy that will greatly increase the durability of our ships.[/COLOR]
[ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] +25% Hit Points to all ships

StringTable.Label: PrecursorMoraleAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Deep inside this Precursor Artifact our surveyors have found a strange device that instills a deep sense of peace anyone in the same room. They think they can reproduce this technology for masses.[/COLOR]
[ICON=Stat_Morale_Icon] +1 Morale to all colonies.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorManufacturingAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This Precursor Artifact seems to have been powered by a strange new type of power cells. We think we can learn from them how to increase the manufacturing capacity efficiency of all our colonies.[/COLOR]
[ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +25% manufacturing to all colonies

StringTable.Label: PrecursorRangeAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Much to our surprise, we have found a breathable atmosphere inside this Precursor Artifact. The device used to maintain this for several millennia. Studying it has proven to be quite useful to our engineers.[/COLOR]
[ICON=Stat_Temp_Icon] +25% range to all ships

StringTable.Label: PrecursorEleriumAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This Precursor Artifact seem to have once been used as a storehouse of sorts We have found a vast quantity of Elerium already refined and ready to use.[/COLOR]
[ICON=Stat_Elerium_Icon] +5 Elerium

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAntimatterAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Inside this Precursor Artifact we have found massive Containment Field holding perfectly good Antimatter, ready to be used, and 'shared' with our enemies.[/COLOR]
[ICON=Stat_Antimatter_Icon] +5 Antimatter

StringTable.Label: PrecursorLogisticsAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String:
[COLOR=UIDefaultHot]While studying how this Precursor Artifact has been able to function for thousands of years, we have discovered new techniques that will greatly assist in our ability to maintain large fleets.[/COLOR]
[ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] +5 Logistics

StringTable.Label: PrecursorMovesAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This Precursor Artifact seems to have been using a previously unknown method to contain its Hyperdrive field. This method is far more effective than anything we have now. We should be able to adapt this new technique to increase the speed of all our ships.[/COLOR] [ICON=Moves_Icon] +25% Moves to all ships
